snippet.title: WA police investigate man's death
snippet.content: A man was treated by paramedics but died in a Perth house, and homicide detectives are now investigating. Paramedics were called to a house in Balga on Friday night where they treated a 36-year-old man who died a short time later. Homicide detectives are investigating the circumstances surrounding the man's death but won't provide any information on his injuries. Originally published as
